title: Quatrefoil Spacer Bead
description:
"Quatrefoil" spacer bead of two double spirals of filigree  and granules.  Attached to the bottom of the bead are two parallel gold tubes.

Condition:  Two granules missing; dirt on bottom.
credit_line: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Thomas S. Brush

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
